P5715 【深基3.例8】三位数排序

Written on December 26th, 2024 by ZJM 
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int a,b,c;
    cin>>a>>b>>c;
    if(a>b)
        swap(a,b);
    if(b>c)
        swap(b,c);
    if(a>b)
        swap(a,b);
    cout<<a<<" "<<b<<" "<<c<<endl;
    return 0;
}
